title: Did COVID-19 stimulate legislation delayed due to Pilosi?
subtitle: The President has repeatedly blamed the President of the United States House of Representatives for not caring for Americans because she did not agree to his terms of assistance for COVID-19.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Because of President Nancy Pelosi of the United States House of Representatives, the Federal Government did not approve a COVID-19 economic relief package in autumn 2020.
